Package org.graphstream.ui.fx_viewer

Class FxViewPanel

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.layout.Region
javafx.scene.layout.Pane
org.graphstream.ui.fx_viewer.FxViewPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget, org.graphstream.ui.view.View
Direct Known Subclasses:
FxDefaultView
public abstract class FxViewPanel
extends javafx.scene.layout.Pane
implements org.graphstream.ui.view.View
A view on a graphic graph. Basically a view is a Pane where a GraphRenderer renders the graphic graph. If you are in the UI thread, you can change the view on the graphic graph using methods to translate, zoom and rotate the view.
